Helper function that makes selections from a color palette.

Source: R/colorHelpers.R
customCols.Rd

A function return hex color codes from a color palette by name or numbered position.

Usage

customCols(pal = qualColors(), cols = NULL)

Arguments

pal

Required, the named color palette as a named vector of color hex codes, defaults to qualColors.

cols

Required, a character vector of names or numbered position to use to select from the named vector of color hex codes , defaults to NULL and returns the full palette.

Value

a named character vector of color hex codes.
